entry.title: Cuticle Therapy Oil
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ativo Skincare
Type: Cuticle Oil
Price: 11.00

Cuticle therapy oil quicky and easily moisturizes cuticles that are essential for nail health. Soften and strengthen your nails with our luxurious oil. Oils like rosehip, jojoba, and argan will quickly penetrate the nail bed to make nails shiny and healthy. 

Features + Benefits

  • 100% Natural
  • 100% Organic
  • Gluten Free
  • GMO Free
  • Vegan
  • Cruelty Free
  • BPA FREE Twist Pen

How to use 

Twist bottom of brush cap until a drop of oil dampens the bristles. Rub bristles all over the nail bed. Massage as necessary

Ingredients

Rosa canina fruit oil, camellia sinensis leaf oil, oenothera biennis (evening primrose) oil,   butyrospermum parkii (shea butter), simmondsia chinensis (jojoba) seed oil, , argania spinosa (argan) kernel oil,  tocopherol (vitamin e), citrus sinensis (sweet orange) oil, citrus limonum (lemon) oil, citrus aurantifolia (lime) oil, citrus paradisi (white grape fruit) oil, mentha piperita (peppermint) oil, mentha spicata (spearmint) oil.

entry.title: Good Fats Lip Balm
entry.summary:
Vendor: Geti Cosmetics
Type: Lip Balm
Price: 4.00

True, lasting moisture in 3 delectable scents. Bring a smile to your face – Zero addictive or drying ingredients. A lip balm that moisturizes and coats your lips, protecting from the elements…as long as you can stop yourself from eating it!

Features + Benefits 

  • Naturally tinted with plant extracts
  • Vegan & Cruelty-Free (PETA certified)
  • Scented with food-grade essential oils – made from fruits and flowers
  • 0.25 oz Recyclable Tin!

Ingredients

Organic Avocado Butter, Organic Cacao Butter, Organic Coconut Oil, Essential Oils. May Contain: Organic Beetroot, Matcha, Turmeric

Store out of the sunlight and below 25 degrees Celcius (77 Fahrenheit).

entry.title: Cocoa Kisses Chocolate Bronzer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Geti Cosmetics
Type: Bronzer
Price: 20.00

This decadent cocoa bronzer comes in a warm cocoa shade & throws a delicate scent to match its rich tones. The only bronzer you'll ever need again!

Features + Benefits

  • 100% Natural, Chemical-Free formula
  • Velvety application – buffs out perfectly
  • Delicious Chocolate scent
  • Comes in Warm & Cool shades to suit all skin tones
  • 30ml loose bronzer powder with removable sifter

How to use

Best applied with a firm bristled blush/powder brush for daytime looks and with a firm/angled brush for evening or more dramatic looks.

Ingredients

Organic Cacao blend, Zea Mays. May contain Saachi Inchi, Organic Charcoal.

entry.title: Brow Love Bee-Friendly Wax - Clear/Tintless
entry.summary:
Vendor: Geti Cosmetics
Type: Brow Wax
Price: 15.00

Finally, a brow product that mimics hair follicles in those bare spots, AND helps create a soothing and detoxifying environment that’s optimal for skin and hair health. Show your brows some LOVE.

Features + Benefits

  • Clear/tintless formula
  • Moisturizing plant-oils rejuvenate the skin
  • Natural shades made from plants – No harsh dyes or heavy metals.
  • No wasted product – get every bit of BrowLove from our waste-free containers.

How to use

Best applied with a firm angled brow brush after brushing brows into the desired position.

Ingredients

Organic Shea Butter, Organic Cocoa Butter, Organic Coconut Oil, Essential Oils.

entry.title: Makeup Brush Cleaner Shampoo
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ativo Skincare
Type: Makeup Brush Cleaner Shampoo
Price: 13.00 - 22.00 (2 variants)

Did you know your makeup brushes harbor more than a dozen different bacteria like Staphylococcus, Streptococcus, and E-coli?  But don't throw them away!!

When you use our solid makeup brush cleaner shampoo, that is gentle for even the most luxurious brushes, you will not be transferring that bacteria to your skin. 

The brush cleaner will thoroughly clean, washing away any dirt and bacteria and the added benefits of argan and apricot oil will condition your brushes, making them feel brand new. The jar is large enough to clean large brushes. Completely safe for natural and synthetic brushes. Avoid getting the ferrule wet. Travel size is perfect for your travel makeup bag. 

How to use

Wet brushes thoroughly, moisten the container with warm water. Lather the brush and swirl, rinse and repeat until the water runs clear. Reshape the bristles and then lay brushes on a flat dry towel.  

Ingredients

A proprietary blend of oils. It contains coconut oil, apricot kernel oil, and argan oil. Patent Pending.* 

Product Information

  • Vegan , Gluten Free, GMO Free, Cruelty Free
  • Shelf life 12 months
